alerts.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a Winter Storm Warning for Burlington and surrounding areas. Heavy snow accumulations of 12-18 inches expected with winds gusting up to 35 mph. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Prepare for power outages and tree damage.
alerts.title: Winter Storm Warning

alerts.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a Wind Chill Advisory for Burlington and surrounding areas. Very cold wind chills expected with wind chills as low as -20Â°F. Frostbite and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken. Wear appropriate clothing and limit time outdoors.
alerts.title: Wind Chill Advisory
